sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RAVENSBURG a county of Germany, in wdl-phalia, bounded on the north by the biſhoprics of oſnaburg and Minden, on the eaſt by Lemgow, on the ſouth by the biſhopric of Paderborn, and on the weſt by that of Munſter. It belongs to the king of. Pruffia, and has its name from the caſtle of Ravenf-burg.

p.hi: Ravensburg, a free and imperial town of Germany, in Algow, in the circle of Suabia. It is well built, and the public ſtructures are handſome. The inhabitants are partly Proteſtants and partly Papiſts.

div.p: It is ſeated on the river C∆enfs, in E. Long. 9. 46. N. Lat. 47. 44.
